snippet.title: Minishoot' - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/16...

Discord: https://discord.gg/cdkUQeJ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soulgameStudio
Facebook: https://facebook.com/soulgame

We hope you'll like this one!

Minishoot' is a cute and unique adventure game that mixes up open world exploration with crispy twin-stick shooter action. Fight your way from the shiny overworld to the deepest caves, improve your ship and overcome the dungeons' bosses to rescue your friends!
